ygData.subject: RE: Resistance and Rhythym songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve had much better luck at resisting magic, fire and cold based spells I guess. I get the resist messages generally at least once a night.  Of course, I
ygData.messageBody:
> That it took a level 8ish mob 20+ spells for me (L30) to see
> one complete resist should tell you something about how
> difficult this check is. I was singing Elemental Rhythms at
> the time with drum equipped, which put my MR in the 80s and FR
> in the 70s. I wasn't trying too hard to keep it up though, so
> it may have dropped to my natural 35/25.
>

I've had much better luck at resisting magic, fire and cold based spells I
guess. I get the resist messages generally at least once a night. Of
course, I used to get it closer to once a week before I picked up my runed
bone fork. Makes a nice range weapon. :-) Spoiler below....

Anthem Dirgemaker
27th level bard of Qeynos and still happily using a dirk.
Solusek Ro

S

P

O

I

L

E

R

For those that don't know, this weapon is kind of ok as a piercing weapon,
but because of its stats it shines as a ranged weapon. It adds 10 to magic,
fire and cold resist. This great weapon can be found in Upper Guk on a mob
that was green to me at level 25 when I got mine (Hint: Its the same frog
that carries the necklace of undead protection). The fork is a rare drop,
took a week for me and the other member of my regular party to each get one.
